mapper.select: SELECT pm.ID , pt.TICKETNO , pt.SCREENDATENO ,pt.SCREENNO ,pt.SEATNO ,pt.AGE ,pr.SCORE FROM P_MEMBER pm ,P_TICKET pt ,P_REVIEW pr WHERE pt.ID = pm.ID AND pt.TICKETNO =pr.TICKETNO(+) AND pm.ID = #{id} ORDER BY pt.TICKETNO

SELECT TO_char(ps.screenTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS Tdate, TO_char(ps.screenTime, 'HH:MI') AS Ttime, pt.id , pt.ticketNo , pt.screenNo , pt.seatNo , pt.age , pt.mid , pm."mTITLE" FROM P_TICKET pt ,P_SCREENDATE ps , P_MOVIE pm WHERE pt.screenDateNo = ps.screenDateNO AND pt.mid = pm.mid ORDER BY Ttime
